title: (Post name-change) Matches from user using my old name in match history
body: As the title says, is there a way to prevent the matches of the user who now has my old name appearing in my match history, because at the moment they are showing up.

replies.body:
Hey Ouroboros,

You'll want to submit a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so they can fix it. Wires get crossed with name changes sometimes; it's not a perfect process. They should be able to help you out here.

-DTN
